name: The Lost Doggy
description: The Lost Dog is a third-person exploration story-rich adventure following the struggles of a dog abandoned by her owner and alone in the wilderness. Take control of the dog as she battles to survive and find the way back to her owners again. Along the way she'll have to find her own path and use her incredible sense of smell as she attempts to track her owner's scent. Only you can help her discover what a happy home really is and find her a new family; as they realize how loving a dog can help them recover from the pain of grief.
